meanings.definition: The act of resigning or giving up a position or responsibility.
meanings.sent1: Her demissions from the company surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The CEO's demissions caused a stir in the office.
meanings.sent3: After her demissions, she decided to pursue her passion for painting.
meanings.sent4: His demissions from the team left a void that was hard to fill.
meanings.sent5: The demissions of the old guard marked a new era for the organization.

meanings.definition: The act of dismissing or removing someone from a position.
meanings.sent1: The demissions of the employees were handled professionally.
meanings.sent2: The demissions of the board members shocked the community.
meanings.sent3: The demissions of the unruly students brought peace to the classroom.
meanings.sent4: Her demissions from the project team were swift and decisive.
meanings.sent5: The demissions of the coach led to a restructuring of the team.

meanings.definition: The act of surrendering or relinquishing something.
meanings.sent1: His demissions of power were seen as a noble gesture.
meanings.sent2: The demissions of territory were part of the peace treaty.
meanings.sent3: The demissions of control over the situation surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The demissions of her dreams left her feeling lost.
meanings.sent5: The demissions of the crown symbolized the end of an era.
